title: How to Make Fish Au Gratin

steps.headline: Debone white fish, if needed.
steps.description: Use boneless fish fillets for the easiest preparation.

steps.headline: Place fish fillets into a baking dish that has been sprayed with nonstick cooking spray.
Bake 30 minutes or until fish tests done.
Make favorite medium white recipe.
steps.description: Add 1 teaspoon sherry or to taste.

text: Preheat oven to 350 to 375 °F (177 to 191 °C).  Debone white fish, if needed. Use boneless fish fillets for the easiest preparation. Place fish fillets into a baking dish that has been sprayed with nonstick cooking spray.  Add milk.  Place fish into oven.  Bake 30 minutes or until fish tests done.  Make favorite medium white recipe. Add 1 teaspoon sherry or to taste. Remove fish from oven.  Preheat broiler.  Top with white sauce.  Top with cheese.  Broil until golden.  Serve.  Serves 4.
